game_description: Operation warcade is a shooter specifically designed for virtual reality, inspired by the late '80s classic war arcade that now uses the latest technology to convert it into a unique experience. EXPERIENCE THE EMOTION FROM WITHIN Thanks to the innovative immersion system, you will be able to travel inside the video game whenever you want to experience the adventure in a completely different way, like shooting from a helicopter, from a trench or from inside a tankâ€¦ because why not? The power is on your side. NEW RULES, USE THE ENVIRONMENT! Use all the elements in the environment in your favor with the incredible gravity gun. You will be able to capture any object in the landscape and launch it against enemies, converting them into a weapon. Your imagination is the limit.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: Fun game.. a little glitchie on the startup. It would be nice to go right to the game at startup rather than viewing all the startup garbage.
review_2: I love this game. It reminds me of those days at the arcade I would spend hours there. Really fun and easy going game. A great intro into a VR game but with a classic feel. Well done
review_3: Unique FPS experience from a big fan of 80s arcade. Gameplay and review: https://youtu.be/xbMRuBxeYXg
review_4: Downloaded this on impulse as it showed arcade cabinets, like what you seen in that PCVR Arcade room. Sadly I don't have pcvr. Opened this up and it's amazing, side scrolling on the rails shooter with immersive parts. Must try for any shooter fan and arcade fans.
review_5: Played the demo, I liked game so far. Driving was a bit of trial for me. I will purchase this soon as seems pretty cool.
